description: This file defines a React functional component named Dashboard that renders a report analytics dashboard. It imports various components and hooks, and processes report data to display metrics such as reports submitted this month, average accomplishments, and blockers. It also visualizes accomplishments by team with a bar chart and submission trends with a sparkline.

methods.name: Dashboard()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the report dashboard UI, processing reports data and including various KPI cards and charts.
